code: import axios from"axios";export default{getBooks:function getBooks(q){return axios.get("/api/google",{params:{q:"title:"+q}});},getSavedBooks:function getSavedBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books");},deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id);},saveBook:function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post("/api/books",bookData);}};
